metadata.Title: CVE-2016-10328 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description:
FreeType 2 before 2016-12-16 has an out-of-bounds write caused by aheap-based buffer overflow related to the cff_parser_run function incff/cffparse.c.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-10328` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

freetype2-demos - 2.5.2-1ubuntu2.7
libfreetype6 - 2.5.2-1ubuntu2.7
No subscription required

criterions.comment: freetype package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.5.2-1ubuntu2.7').
